meanings.sent1: The movie was the lengthiest I have ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The lengthiest line at the amusement park was for the roller coaster.
meanings.sent3: Waiting for the bus felt like the lengthiest part of my day.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was the lengthiest river flowing down her back.
meanings.sent5: The lengthiest road trip of my life was to the Grand Canyon.

meanings.definition: Most extended in space or time.
meanings.sent1: The lengthiest book on the shelf was a dictionary.
meanings.sent2: The lengthiest journey I ever took was to Antarctica.
meanings.sent3: The lengthiest line at the grocery store made me late for work.
meanings.sent4: His speech was the lengthiest river, meandering through various topics.
meanings.sent5: The lengthiest summer seemed to stretch on forever.
